title: Christmas RP Giveaway
body: Hi! My Friend sent me a link to the Christmas RP giveaway but It isnt working when I sent it to 14 friends. Thanks..

replies.body: That's because it's a scam.  You've been sending your friends links to scam sites.  You'll want to protect your account now and change your password.
good thing i didnt try it...been online for a while..kid kept sending the link so i researched before i went through...its always too good to be true..

if riot was doing any sort of giveaway they'd have it posted on their ACTUAL site news.

if it's not there, do NOT try to enter any sort of rp or skin giveaway of any sort. likely it will be a scam that will attempt to steal your account info.
It's a fake link. ^_^
Riot did it last year, but i don't think they'll do it again this year {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
i use that link for free RP and i got 8 points then i use for 20$ RP but i dont got any thing WTF>>!!??
its fake

Hi! so am i safe if only e-mail verifacation??? sry not good english but riot i need an answer
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
{{champion:62}} {{summoner:30}} {{item:3071}}

Well, I went and did everything with one of my smurf accounts and what ended up happening after completing the survey with fake info, I sat and waited for maybe an hour to an hour and a half where it would not load. now I feel bad that I sent this to every one of my friends. So don't do this. It is just a scam. Make sure to secure your account by changing the passcodes and all of the security stuff.
Is it really fake? Coz I'm getting points...

It really is fake, it happens every year. The points don't do anything. I remember spreading links last year because it was tempting and didn't get anything (I didn't know any better and thought I could get a free Snow day 
singed skin). Just don't bother with it unless it is actually on the main webpage.
It is FAKE, I received it as well. Sent a ticket to Riot Support, they say that it is just a scam.
If someone sent it to me through discord, and I clicked on it, will my league account still be safe?
They have done this for more then 2 years.  Its a Scam.  Change your password ASAP
So do I just change password and then it will be protected? Or are there more steps?

Yeah, these links are most def a scam. Any links that are legit will most often be on a Riot domain. For example:   **examplelink.riotgames.com**

Changing your account password, and the email password (if it's the same password) would be a great choice to reduce the chances of your account being compromised in this situation. Additionally, you can find a list of best practices to keep your account secure in our [**Protecting your Account guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Hey targon i know this isnt the place for it but has there been any posts on why {{item:3116}} is being gutted? some champs really need it for kiting but this kinda makes it worse to kite
You guys if you look at the link, then hit homepage, its gonna say the server is EU. So im assuming this RP giveaway isnt actually a scam but only for EU servers only.
its fake my friend sent it to me too

Yes its fake, I thought that it was real just like you but it wasnt. The thing that shows that it is fake is the link. If you look at the link it isnt really the real League of Legends website link.
If you click on one of the boxes on the top such as "Home, Boards, News, Game, etc," the link completely changes from the scam site and you get directed back to the real site. That's how they convince people that it's not a scam. Dont send the link too others and if you or even your friends entered any account information in the scam site look for anything unusual with your account. Be safe out thereüëçüèº
